ygData.subject: Re: Red Headband Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I decided to give it one more go today. I get to Paw and find the room. I attack the commander out in front of the shaman s room and guess who comes charging
ygData.messageBody:
I decided to give it one more go today. I get to Paw and find the room. I attack the commander out in front of the shaman's room and guess who comes charging out after me? None other than Phido himself. I switch focus to him and start pounding him, all the while the commander's taking free shots at me. I finally manage to kill Phido, but have a bubble of health left. I feign, wait a minute, loot Phido, collect Dareb's skull. bind my wounds, mend, and high tail it to Qeynos. Yes, there will be better headgear, but I'm kinda proud of my red headband <g>

Owyn
Test Server
-----Original Message-----
From: ScottM@... <ScottM@...>
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 7:32 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Red Headband Quest


Well after many hours in Paw, I have done this quest. You just have to keep killing Ren'Rexx eventually phido does spawn.... The other two heads come from Ghanex Drah who is a normal spawn, and the third comes from killing High Shaman Grisok who is a random spawn for Shaman Lenrel...

I got Ghanex Drah's head easily, it took around 7 hours (non-consecitvly) of fighting till I got the other two heads, as a coincidence both Grisok and Phido spawned at the same time (was killing all three in a circle)

Wade
Solusek Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Dave Woomer [mailto:dwoomer@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 5:34 AM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Red Headband Quest



From: "Dave Woomer" <dwoomer@...>

Hello, brothers and sisters...

Just spent a long, frustrating night in Paw trying to get the head of Dareb.
I've heard you get this item from High Shaman Phido, who is a rare spawn,
who shows up in place of Shaman Ren'Rexx on occasion. Well, I killed Ren'Rex
so many times I started feeling sorry for him <g>. Does anyone know who to
get the head of Dareb? After questing for the headband items for weeks, I
don't feel bad about a spoiler at this point <g>

Thanks!
